languages.text: "Все в нашей жизни — какая-то игра, шерин. Мы играем, нами играют. Без игры все становится скучным".
"Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."
languages.original_text: "Все в нашей жизни — какая-то игра, шерин. Мы играем, нами играют. Без игры все становится скучным".

traits.locale_text: "Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “我们人生中的一切都是游戏，亲爱的。我们玩游戏，也会被游戏玩。如果没有游戏，一切都会无聊得让人无法忍受。”
languages.original_text: "Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."

traits.locale_text: “我们人生中的一切都是游戏，亲爱的。我们玩游戏，也会被游戏玩。如果没有游戏，一切都会无聊得让人无法忍受。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「人生のすべてがゲームなんだよ、シャリーン。あたしたちは遊び、遊ばれている。ゲームがなければ、何もかもが耐えられないほど退屈なものになってしまう」
languages.original_text: "Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."

traits.locale_text: 「人生のすべてがゲームなんだよ、シャリーン。あたしたちは遊び、遊ばれている。ゲームがなければ、何もかもが耐えられないほど退屈なものになってしまう」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Todo en esta vida es un juego, shereen. Jugamos y juegan con nosotros. Sin los juegos, la vida sería horriblemente tediosa».
languages.original_text: "Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."

traits.locale_text: «Todo en esta vida es un juego, shereen. Jugamos y juegan con nosotros. Sin los juegos, la vida sería horriblemente tediosa».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Tout est un jeu dans nos vies, shereen. Nous jouons, et on se joue de nous en retour. Sans jeux, le quotidien serait horriblement ennuyeux. »
languages.original_text: "Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."

traits.locale_text: « Tout est un jeu dans nos vies, shereen. Nous jouons, et on se joue de nous en retour. Sans jeux, le quotidien serait horriblement ennuyeux. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Alles in unseren Leben ist ein Spiel, Shereen. Wir spielen mit jemanden, mit uns wird gespielt. Ohne Spiele wäre doch alles nur unerträglich öde."
languages.original_text: "Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."

traits.locale_text: "Alles in unseren Leben ist ein Spiel, Shereen. Wir spielen mit jemanden, mit uns wird gespielt. Ohne Spiele wäre doch alles nur unerträglich öde."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Hayatlarımızdaki her şey birer oyundur şirinim. Oynarız, oynanırız. Oyunlar olmasaydı her şey katlanılamaz derecede sıkıcı olurdu."
languages.original_text: "Everything in our lives is a game, shereen. We play, we are played. Without games, everything would be so unbearably dull."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatlarımızdaki her şey bir oyundur şirinim. Oynarız, oynanırız. Oyunlar olmasaydı her şey katlanılamaz derecede sıkıcı olurdu."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
